post_message: First lady Michelle Obama's family trip to Africa, Spain and Morocco to promote her "Let Girls Learn" initiative, and cut a CNN documentary on the effort, has already crossed the $1 million mark with many more expenses still to be tabulated. According to the bills that have already come in, Obama, accompanied by an entourage that includes her mom and daughters, has spent about $1.06 million: $512,737 for hotels and $252,471 for limos and transportation. - via Washington Examiner
